page.title: 07Ollerton Dukeries Complex
page.content: On 18th. April, 1985 the Dukeries Complex was officially opened. Previously the Dukeries Comprehensive School, the Complex is a powerful {community resource}designed to help young and old, unemployed, handicapped and essentially the whole family. The opportunity to develop the Complex arose from falling roles at the Dukeries School (from nearly 2,000 places to an anticipted 900 by 1990). The central unit is the{Community {College}(previously the school). Additionally, there is the Recreation Centre,Under 5's Centre, Community Library,Youth Centre, Information Centre,Agency Base and mini-Town Hall, Day Centre for Senior Citizens, Residential Centre and Social Education Centre for the Mentally Handicapped.
